organic.snippet: We are a national recovery agency that has provided Emotional Support and Financial Aid to Burned Children and their Families since 1989.

organic.title: The South Carolina Burn Center | MUSC Health | Charleston SC
organic.snippet: Our burn care experts treat burns of all types. Patients of every age and body type can get advanced burn care right here in South Carolina.
